name: MushroomFacts(ShroomRoom)
0:
”Alexa open shroom room”
”Alexa ask shroom room for a fact”
”Alexa tell shroom room to give me information on shrooms”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shroom room
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ask alexa to open the skill, "shroom room" and followed by a request for a fact and you will be provided with some neat information on mushrooms. This skill is a great way to kill time when you're bored or even to get some great facts to start your day with.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
